sentence.Network_en: The agronomist suggested growing rice on the dried river bed.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位农学家建议在干涸的河床上种水稻.

sentence.Network_en: She has elected to become an agronomist.

entry.def: An agronomist is someone who studies the growing and harvesting of crops.

means.word_mean: 1. an expert in soil management and field-crop production

auth_sentence.content: Go talk to an agronomist at a state university such as Iowa State U.
